name: Comheater
description:
Chandler was a man who just needed to drink coffee to keep working in his office. However, there is just a old computer which can be used to heat coffee in his office.

How to play:

You should keep the computer heat in a specific temperature through applications. Open applications on desktop to heat computer, or close them if it is overheated. You can observe computer's or coffee's heat from indicators on the left. If computer's heat is in the darker area, coffee will warm quicker.

Made by PikselCo. Thanks for playing.
